name: spec-kit-skill
description: GitHub Spec-Kit integration for constitution-based spec-driven development with a 7-phase workflow: Constitution, Specify, Clarify, Plan, Tasks, Analyze, and Implement.
longDescription:
Spec-Kit brings structured, constitution-driven feature development to your workflow.

Instead of jumping straight into code, Spec-Kit guides you through seven deliberate phases: establishing governing principles (Constitution), defining functional requirements (Specify), resolving ambiguities (Clarify), creating a technical strategy (Plan), generating dependency-ordered tasks (Tasks), validating cross-artifact consistency (Analyze), and finally executing implementation (Implement).

Each phase produces concrete artifacts stored in .specify/specs/ with numbered features. The workflow integrates with Git branches, uses bash scripts for automation, and ensures every decision aligns with your project's constitution. Whether you're a solo developer wanting rigor or a team needing structured collaboration, Spec-Kit turns vague feature requests into bulletproof implementation plans.
